sans-serif;font-size: 12px;white-space: nowrap;line-height: 14px;margin: 5px 10px;padding: 5px;position: absolute;z-index: 10001} --></style> <p><strong>Overview:</strong></p> <p>The Purchase Initiation Form (PIF) has been developed to make more efficient the purchasing/procurement process across Ameren. Specifically in buying IT stuff. This form will need to be filled out anytime that a new purchase is being made or requested. Whether that be for a product, software, services, maintenance, etc. The requestor will fill out as much information as possible and that is required on the form.</p> <p><strong>What to Expect:</strong></p> <p>Once the form is filled out and submitted, it will be reviewed by ITBS and Procurement. If additional information is needed by the part of the requestor they will be notified with what information is needed. Also selected departments, determined by ITBS and Procurement will be granted access and notified for action. The requester will have the ability to view and track the status of the request as it is reviewed and approved by various departments.</p> <p><strong>Estimated Delivery Date:</strong></p> <p>The overall expectation for the completion and approval of the form should be within two weeks of the request. Of course the time may vary based on the information given and if large amount of review needs to take place.</p> <p> </p>
